page.title: 08Television
page.content: One thing young people are always being criticised for is watching too much television. Teachers and parents often saw we should read more and watch television less. Some older people did not have television when they were young, none of our class could imagine what life would be like without TV. This is the viewing habits of our group, averaged out from a week's viewing. 55% watched TV in the morning before school 100% watched TV at some time every day The average length of time watching each day was: Less than 1 hour: 17% 1 - 2 hours: 13% 2 - 3 hours: 25% 3 - 4 hours: 28% More than 4 hours: 17%
